entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -34.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 6:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -34.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -39.5°C
Wind: WNW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 59 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 in the evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
